content:
The Russian army continues to attack Berislav from drones.

About thisreportedKherson Ova.

A 50-year-old man received an explosive trauma and injury to the drone.

The victim was taken to the hospital. Doctors provide him with help.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy againappliesHeaded aircraft in Kherson region.

Significant destructionfixedIn the village of Red Lighthouse of Beryslav district, which last night the occupiers dumped managed aircraft.
title: The invaders dumped out of the drone of explosives on a resident of Beryslav
description: This was reported by the Kherson Ova. Due to the dumping of an explosive object from a drone ...
author: Army Inform
